body_html: @znmeb Yeah I am also trying to get some MIOpen and TensorFlow stuff working on my RX 480, but I don't want to destroy my main development rig, so instead I use IOMMU virtualization and use an Ubuntu 16.04 virtual machine that can use the RX 480. The AMD drivers are very friendly to virtualization (unlike nVidia drivers made for the gaming cards - only the Quadro drivers do).
